comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I am not convinced this is "South Head", due to the landform in the right background, and the semi-circular gun emplacement.  I think it is more likely to be Middle Head or Georges Heights, but I can'r yet prove it.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Wrong! It IS on the west side of HMAS Watson at South Head, looking west towards Bradleys Head. There is an old cannon there now. Google Maps satellite - maps.google.com.au/maps?ie=UTF8&hq=&hnear=Sydney+...
